item.title: Project Honeypot HTTP Blocklist module
item.author: mubix
item.description: Most malicious IP lists focus on the client side threat, where servers (hosted or exploited) host client side exploits or evil scripting. These don’t really help the server admins very much. Project Honeypot does an amazing job at keeping detailed information on scanners / harvesters and brute forcers, the likes of which are the daily enemy of said admins. They offer a service called HTTP Block List or ‘HTTP:BL’. Another way this list differs from the rest is it isn’t a list you can download.
